48.ara-name: كتاب الدعوات عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Anas narrated that:When the Prophet would return from a trip and see the walls of Al-Madinah, he would speed up his riding camel, and if he was upon a beast, he would agitate it, out of his love for Al-Madinah

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا يَقُولُ إِذَا قَدِمَ مِنَ السَّفَرِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About What One Says When Returning From His Journey
